datmanager

Class DatFileManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • datmanager.DatFileManager

  • public class DatFileManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Manage a single DatFile with save/load methods
    Author:
    MarcoForlini

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DatFileManager(DatFile datFile)
      Create a new DatFileManager to read or write the given datFile.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DatFile read(java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Float,java.lang.Integer> update, int threadIndex)
      Read the whole file, perform regular updates of the progress on the GUI and return the content read.
      EntryGroup readGroup(DatReader reader, java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Float,java.lang.Integer> update, int threadIndex)
      Read a single EntryGroup from the file, perform regular updates on of the progress on the GUI and return the list of entries.
      void save(java.lang.Runnable update)
      Save the given list of EntryGroup to the file and perform regular updates of the progress on the GUI.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • DatFileManager

        public DatFileManager(DatFile datFile)
               throws java.io.IOException
        Create a new DatFileManager to read or write the given datFile.
        Parameters:
        datFile - The file to load with the relative structure
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If any IO exception occur

    • Method Detail

      • read

        public DatFile read(java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Float,java.lang.Integer> update,
                    int threadIndex)
             throws java.io.IOException,
                    java.nio.BufferUnderflowException
        Read the whole file, perform regular updates of the progress on the GUI and return the content read. Support multi-thread loadings: you can load many files at once and display a single progress bar for them all.
        Parameters:
        update - The method to call to update the state on the GUI
        threadIndex - Which thread is this
        Returns:
        The list of EntryGroup read from the file, if any
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a problem occurs while reading
        java.nio.BufferUnderflowException - If loading the wrong/encrypted files

      • readGroup

        public EntryGroup readGroup(DatReader reader,
                            java.util.function.BiConsumer<java.lang.Float,java.lang.Integer> update,
                            int threadIndex)
                     throws java.io.IOException,
                            java.nio.BufferUnderflowException
        Read a single EntryGroup from the file, perform regular updates on of the progress on the GUI and return the list of entries. Support multi-thread loadings: you can load many files at once and display a single progress bar for them all.
        Parameters:
        reader - The reader used to read the file
        update - The method to call to update the state on the GUI
        threadIndex - Which thread is this
        Returns:
        The list of Entry read from the file, if any
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a problem occurs while reading
        java.nio.BufferUnderflowException - If loading the wrong/encrypted files

      • save

        public void save(java.lang.Runnable update)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Save the given list of EntryGroup to the file and perform regular updates of the progress on the GUI.
        Parameters:
        update - The method to call to update the state on the GUI
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If a problem occurs while saving
